program a_sequence_of_permutations
  implicit none
  integer :: n, k, p(100000) = 0, q(100000) = 0, r(100000,2) = 0, i
  read(*,*) n, k
  read(*,*) p(1:n)
  read(*,*) q(1:n)
  if (k == 1) then
    call output(p(1:n))
    stop
  end if
  r(1:n,2) = q(1:n)
  do i = 3, k
    r(1:n,1) = p(1:n)
    call quick_sort(r(1:n,:),1)
    p(1:n) = q(1:n)
    q(1:n) = r(1:n,2)
  end do
  call output(q(1:n))
contains
  subroutine output(a)
    integer, intent(in) :: a(:)
    integer :: n, i
    n = size(a)
    write(*,'(i0)',advance='no') a(1)
    do i = 2, n
      write(*,'(x,i0)',advance='no') a(i)
    end do
    write(*,*)
  end
  recursive subroutine quick_sort(a,i)
    integer, intent(inout) :: a(:,:)
    integer, intent(in) :: i
    integer :: n, l, r, m
    integer :: p, b(size(a,2))
    n = size(a,1)
    l = 1
    r = n
    m = (l+r)/2
    p = a(m,i)+a(l,i)+a(r,i)-max(a(m,i),a(l,i),a(r,i))-min(a(m,i),a(l,i),a(r,i))
    do
      do while (a(l,i) < p)
        l = l+1
      end do
      do while (a(r,i) > p)
        r = r-1
      end do
      if (l >= r) exit
      b = a(l,:)
      a(l,:) = a(r,:)
      a(r,:) = b
      l = l+1
      r = r-1
    end do
    if (1 < l-1) call quick_sort(a(1:l-1,:),i)
    if (r+1 < n) call quick_sort(a(r+1:n,:),i)
  end
end program a_sequence_of_permutations

program a_sequence_of_permutations
  implicit none
  integer :: n, k, m, i
  integer, allocatable :: p(:), q(:), a(:), b(:), c(:), d(:)
  read(*,*) n, k
  allocate(p(n),q(n),a(n),b(n),c(n),d(n))
  read(*,*) p(1:n)
  read(*,*) q(1:n)
  select case (mod(k-1,6)+1)
  case (1)
    a = identity(n)
    b = p
  case (2)
    a = identity(n)
    b = q
  case (3)
    a = identity(n)
    b = composite(q,inverse(p))
  case (4)
    a = q
    b = inverse(p)
  case (5)
    a = composite(q,inverse(p))
    b = inverse(q)
  case (6)
    a = composite(q,inverse(p))
    b = composite(inverse(q),p)
  end select
  m = (k-1)/6
  c = composite(composite(q,inverse(p)),composite(inverse(q),p))
  d = identity(n)
  do while (m > 0)
    if (btest(m,0)) d = composite(c,d)
    c = composite(c,c)
    m = rshift(m,1)
  end do
  a = composite(a,d)
  call output(composite(a,composite(b,inverse(a))))
contains
  subroutine output(a)
    integer, intent(in) :: a(:)
    integer :: n, i
    n = size(a)
    write(*,'(i0)',advance='no') a(1)
    do i = 2, n
      write(*,'(x,i0)',advance='no') a(i)
    end do
    write(*,*)
  end
  function identity(n) result(ret)
    integer, intent(in) :: n
    integer :: ret(n), i
    do i = 1, n
      ret(i) = i
    end do
  end
  function composite(a,b) result(ret)
    integer, intent(in) :: a(:), b(:)
    integer :: n, ret(size(a)), i
    n = size(a)
    do i = 1, n
      ret(i) = a(b(i))
    end do
  end
  function inverse(a) result(ret)
    integer, intent(in) :: a(:)
    integer :: n, ret(size(a)), i
    n = size(a)
    do i = 1, n
      ret(a(i)) = i
    end do
  end
end program a_sequence_of_permutations

program a_sequence_of_permutations
  implicit none
  integer :: n, k, i, loop
  integer :: p(100000), q(100000), p0(100000), q0(100000)
  p = 0
  q = 0
  read(*,*) n, k
  read(*,*) p(1:n)
  read(*,*) q(1:n)
  if (n.eq.1) then
    write(*,'(i0)') 1
    stop
  end if
  if (k.eq.1) then
    write(*,'(i0)',advance='no') p(1)
    do i = 2, n
      write(*,'(x,i0)',advance='no') p(i)
    end do
    write(*,*)
    stop
  else if (k.eq.2) then
    write(*,'(i0)',advance='no') q(1)
    do i = 2, n
      write(*,'(x,i0)',advance='no') q(i)
    end do
    write(*,*)
    stop
  end if
  p0 = p
  q0 = q
  loop = -1
  do i = 3, k
    call swap(n,p(1:n),q(1:n))
    if ((sum(abs(p(1:n)-p0(1:n))).eq.0).and.(sum(abs(q(1:n)-q0(1:n))).eq.0)) then
      loop = i-2
      exit
    end if
  end do
  if (loop.gt.0) then
    k = mod(k,loop) + 1
    if (k.eq.1) then
      write(*,'(i0)',advance='no') p(1)
      do i = 2, n
        write(*,'(x,i0)',advance='no') p(i)
      end do
      write(*,*)
      stop
    else if (k.eq.2) then
      write(*,'(i0)',advance='no') q(1)
      do i = 2, n
        write(*,'(x,i0)',advance='no') q(i)
      end do
      write(*,*)
      stop
    end if
    do i = 3, k
      call swap(n,p(1:n),q(1:n))
    end do
  end if
  write(*,'(i0)',advance='no') q(1)
  do i = 2, n
    write(*,'(x,i0)',advance='no') q(i)
  end do
  write(*,*)
  stop
contains
  subroutine swap(n,p,q)
    implicit none
    integer, intent(inout) :: n, p(n), q(n)
    integer :: r(n), i
    do i = 1, n
      r(p(i)) = q(i)
    end do
    p = q
    q = r
    return
  end subroutine swap
end program a_sequence_of_permutations

program a_sequence_of_permutations
  implicit none
  integer :: n, k, p(100000) = 0, q(100000) = 0, r(100000,2) = 0, i
  read(*,*) n, k
  read(*,*) p(1:n)
  read(*,*) q(1:n)
  if (k < 3) then
    if (k == 1) then
      call output(p(1:n))
    else
      call output(q(1:n))
    end if
    stop
  end if
  do i = 3, k
    r(1:n,1) = p(1:n)
    r(1:n,2) = q(1:n)
    call quick_sort(r(1:n,:),1)
    p(1:n) = q(1:n)
    q(1:n) = r(1:n,2)
  end do
  call output(q(1:n))
contains
  subroutine output(a)
    integer, intent(in) :: a(:)
    integer :: n, i
    n = size(a)
    write(*,'(i0)',advance='no') a(1)
    do i = 2, n
      write(*,'(x,i0)',advance='no') a(i)
    end do
    write(*,*)
  end
  recursive subroutine quick_sort(a,i)
    integer, intent(inout) :: a(:,:)
    integer, intent(in) :: i
    integer :: n, l, r, m
    integer :: p, b(size(a,2))
    n = size(a,1)
    l = 1
    r = n
    m = (l+r)/2
    p = a(m,i)+a(l,i)+a(r,i)-max(a(m,i),a(l,i),a(r,i))-min(a(m,i),a(l,i),a(r,i))
    do
      do while (a(l,i) < p)
        l = l+1
      end do
      do while (a(r,i) > p)
        r = r-1
      end do
      if (l >= r) exit
      b = a(l,:)
      a(l,:) = a(r,:)
      a(r,:) = b
      l = l+1
      r = r-1
    end do
    if (1 < l-1) call quick_sort(a(1:l-1,:),i)
    if (r+1 < n) call quick_sort(a(r+1:n,:),i)
  end
end program a_sequence_of_permutations

main :: IO ()
main = do
  [n,k] <- map readInt . words <$> getLine
  p <- VU.map (subtract 1) . VU.unfoldrN n (runStateT $ rIntS) <$> BS.getLine
  q <- VU.map (subtract 1) . VU.unfoldrN n (runStateT $ rIntS) <$> BS.getLine
  let ?n = n
  BSB.hPutBuilder stdout
    $ VU.foldr (\ !j r !sp -> sp <> BSB.intDec j <> r (BSB.char7 ' '))
       (\ !sp -> BSB.char7 '\n') (VU.map (+1) $ query p q k) mempty


query :: (?n :: Int) => Perm -> Perm -> Int -> Perm
query !p_immut !q_immut !k = VU.create $ do
  p <- VU.unsafeThaw p_immut
  q <- VU.unsafeThaw q_immut
  tmp_reg <- VUM.new (?n * 2)
  let (!tmp0,!tmp1) = VUM.splitAt ?n tmp_reg
      (!kd6, !km6) = (k-1) `divMod` 6
      loop p q next 0  = return (p,q,next)
      loop p q next !k = do
        forM_ [0 .. ?n-1] $ \ !i -> do
          pi <- VUM.read p i
          VUM.write next pi =<< VUM.read q i
        loop q next p (k-1)
  (pp, qq, tmp2) <- loop p q tmp0 km6 -- (pp,qq) = F^km6(p,q)
      -- now tmp0,p,q are unusable
      -- Meaningful values are in pp and qq; tmp1 and tmp2 are free.
  forM_ [0 .. ?n-1] $ \ !i -> do -- tmp1 = qq*(qq*pp)^{-1}
    qpi <- VUM.read qq =<< VUM.read pp i
    VUM.write tmp1 qpi =<< VUM.read qq i
  forM_ [0 .. ?n-1] $ \ !i -> do -- tmp2 = tmp1*pp
    VUM.write tmp2 i =<< VUM.read tmp1 =<< VUM.read pp i
      -- Values for later use are in tmp2 and pp
      -- tmp1 and qq have meaningful values, but will not be used later,
      -- and thus are free
  let pow b tmp res !e = do
        forM_ [0 .. ?n-1] $ \ !i -> VUM.write res i i
        when (e > 0) $ powloop b tmp res e
      powloop b tmp res !e = do
        when (odd e) $ forM_ [0 .. ?n-1] $ \ !i ->
          VUM.write res i =<< VUM.read b =<< VUM.read res i
        let !e1 = e `shiftR` 1
        when (e1 > 0) $ do
          forM_ [0 .. ?n-1] $ \ !i ->
            VUM.write tmp i =<< VUM.read b =<< VUM.read b i
          powloop tmp b res e1
  pow tmp2 qq tmp1 kd6 -- tmp1 = (tmp2)^kd6
    -- Now tmp2 and qq are freed and hold meaningless values
  forM_ [0 .. ?n - 1] $ \ !i -> do -- tmp2 = tmp1*pp*(tmp1)^{-1}
    tmp1i <- VUM.read tmp1 i
    VUM.write tmp2 tmp1i =<< VUM.read tmp1 =<< VUM.read pp i
  return tmp2

{-# INLINE wrA #-}
wrA = A.writeArray
{-# INLINE rdA #-}
rdA = A.readArray
{-# INLINE mdA #-}
mdA arr f i = do
  ai <- rdA arr i
  let fai = f ai 
  wrA arr i fai
  return (ai,fai)
{-# INLINE mdA' #-}
mdA' arr f i = do
  !ai <- rdA arr i
  let !fai = f ai
  wrA arr i fai
  return (ai,fai)
{-# INLINE swapA #-}
swapA arr i j = do
  ai <- rdA arr i
  wrA arr i =<< rdA arr j
  wrA arr j ai

-- | 'iterate\'' is the strict version of 'iterate'.
--
-- It ensures that the result of each application of force to weak head normal
-- form before proceeding.
{-# NOINLINE [1] iterate' #-}
iterate' :: (a -> a) -> a -> [a]
iterate' f x =
    let x' = f x
    in x' `seq` (x : iterate' f x')

{-# INLINE [0] iterate'FB #-} -- See Note [Inline FB functions]
iterate'FB :: (a -> b -> b) -> (a -> a) -> a -> b
iterate'FB c f x0 = go x0
  where go x =
            let x' = f x
            in x' `seq` (x `c` go x')

{-# RULES
"iterate'"    [~1] forall f x.   iterate' f x = build (\c _n -> iterate'FB c f x)
"iterate'FB"  [1]                iterate'FB (:) = iterate'
 #-}

main :: IO ()
main = do
  [n,k] <- map readInt . words <$> getLine
  [p,q] <- replicateM 2 $ VU.map (subtract 1)
    . VU.unfoldrN n (runStateT $ rIntS) <$> BS.getLine
  let ?n = n
  let (kd6, km6) = (k-1) `divMod` 6
      actor_main = sympow (conjinv q p `comp` p) kd6
      ans = (!! km6)
        [conj actor_main p,
         conj actor_main q,
         conj actor_main (f p q),
         conjinv (actor_main `comp` q) p,
         conjinv (comp actor_main q `g` p) q,
         conj (comp actor_main q `g` comp q p) (g p q)]
  BSB.hPutBuilder stdout
    $ F.fold
    $ V.imap (\i -> if i > 0 then (BSB.char7 ' ' <>) else id)
    $ V.map BSB.intDec $ V.convert $ VU.map (+1) ans
   

-- Aut_Set({0,..,n-1})
-- To be used under the constraint (?n :: Int)
-- INVARIANT : VU.length x == ?n for x :: Perm
-- INVARIANT : VU.all (uncurry (==)) $ VU.indexed $ sort x for x :: Perm
type Perm = VU.Vector Int

idperm :: (?n :: Int) => Perm
{-# INLINE idperm #-}
idperm = VU.generate ?n id

inv :: (?n :: Int) => Perm -> Perm
{-# INLINE inv #-}
inv = g idperm

comp :: Perm -> Perm -> Perm
{-# INLINE comp #-}
comp = VU.map . (VU.!)

-- f p q = qp^{-1}
f :: (?n :: Int) => Perm -> Perm -> Perm
{-# INLINE f #-}
f = VU.update_ (VU.replicate ?n (-1))

-- g p q = pq^{-1}
g :: (?n :: Int) => Perm -> Perm -> Perm
{-# INLINE g #-}
g = flip f

-- conj p x = pxp^{-1}
conj :: (?n :: Int) => Perm -> Perm -> Perm
{-# INLINE conj #-}
conj p x = g (comp p x) p

-- conjinv p x = px^{-1}p^{-1}
conjinv :: (?n :: Int) => Perm -> Perm -> Perm
{-# INLINE conjinv #-}
conjinv p x = g p (comp p x)

sympow :: (?n :: Int) => Perm -> Int -> Perm
sympow p 0 = idperm
sympow p k = VU.create $ do
  vec <- VU.thaw idperm
  let loop !p !k = do
        when (testBit k 0) $ forM_ [0 .. ?n-1] $ VUM.modify vec (p VU.!)
        let k1 = shiftR k 1
        when (k1 > 0) $ loop (comp p p) k1
  if k >= 0 then loop p k else loop (inv p) (-k)
  return vec

main :: IO ()
main = do
  [n,k] <- map readInt . words <$> getLine
  p <- VU.map (subtract 1) . VU.unfoldrN n (runStateT $ rIntS) <$> BS.getLine
  q <- VU.map (subtract 1) . VU.unfoldrN n (runStateT $ rIntS) <$> BS.getLine
  let ?n = n
  BSB.hPutBuilder stdout
    $ VU.foldr (\ !j r !sp -> sp <> BSB.intDec j <> r (BSB.char7 ' '))
       (\ !sp -> BSB.char7 '\n') (VU.map (+1) $ query p q k) mempty


query :: (?n :: Int) => Perm -> Perm -> Int -> Perm
query !p_immut !q_immut !k = VU.create $ do
  p <- VU.unsafeThaw p_immut
  q <- VU.unsafeThaw q_immut
  tmp_reg <- VUM.new (?n * 2)
  let (!tmp0,!tmp1) = VUM.splitAt ?n tmp_reg
      (!kd6, !km6) = (k-1) `divMod` 6
      loop !p !q !next 0  = return (p,q,next)
      loop !p !q !next !k = do
        forM_ [0 .. ?n-1] $ \ !i -> do
          !pi <- VUM.unsafeRead p i
          (VUM.write next pi $!) =<< VUM.unsafeRead q i
        loop q next p (k-1)
  (!pp, !qq, !tmp2) <- loop p q tmp0 km6 -- (pp,qq) = F^km6(p,q)
      -- now tmp0,p,q are unusable
      -- Meaningful values are in pp and qq; tmp1 and tmp2 are free.
  forM_ [0 .. ?n-1] $ \ !i -> do -- tmp1 = qq*(qq*pp)^{-1}
    !qpi <- (VUM.unsafeRead qq $!) =<< VUM.unsafeRead pp i
    (VUM.unsafeWrite tmp1 qpi $!) =<< VUM.unsafeRead qq i
  forM_ [0 .. ?n-1] $ \ !i -> do -- tmp2 = tmp1*pp
    (VUM.unsafeWrite tmp2 i $!)
      =<< (VUM.unsafeRead tmp1 $!) =<< VUM.unsafeRead pp i
      -- Values for later use are in tmp2 and pp
      -- tmp1 and qq have meaningful values, but will not be used later,
      -- and thus are free
  let pow !b !tmp !res !e = do
        forM_ [0 .. ?n-1] $ \ !i -> VUM.unsafeWrite res i i
        when (e > 0) $ powloop b tmp res e
      powloop !b !tmp !res !e = do
        when (odd e) $ forM_ [0 .. ?n-1] $ \ !i ->
          (VUM.unsafeWrite res i $!)
          =<< (VUM.unsafeRead b $!) =<< VUM.unsafeRead res i
        let !e1 = e `shiftR` 1
        when (e1 > 0) $ do
          forM_ [0 .. ?n-1] $ \ !i ->
            (VUM.unsafeWrite tmp i $!)
            =<< (VUM.unsafeRead b $!) =<< VUM.unsafeRead b i
          powloop tmp b res e1
  pow tmp2 qq tmp1 kd6 -- tmp1 = (tmp2)^kd6
    -- Now tmp2 and qq are freed and hold meaningless values
  forM_ [0 .. ?n - 1] $ \ !i -> do -- tmp2 = tmp1*pp*(tmp1)^{-1}
    !tmp1i <- VUM.unsafeRead tmp1 i
    (VUM.unsafeWrite tmp2 tmp1i $!)
      =<< (VUM.unsafeRead tmp1 $!) =<< VUM.unsafeRead pp i
  return tmp2

main :: IO ()
main = do
  [n,k] <- map readInt . words <$> getLine
  [p,q] <- replicateM 2 $ VU.map (subtract 1)
    . VU.unfoldrN n (runStateT $ rIntS) <$> BS.getLine
  let ?n = n
  let (kd6, km6) = (k-1) `divMod` 6
      actor = sympow (conjinv q p `comp` p) kd6
      p1 = conj actor p
      q1 = conj actor q
      ans = fst $ (!! km6) $ iterate' (\(!x,!y) -> (y,f x y)) (p1,q1)
  BSB.hPutBuilder stdout
    $ VU.foldr (\ !j r !sp -> sp <> BSB.intDec j <> r (BSB.char7 ' '))
       (\ !sp -> BSB.char7 '\n') (VU.map (+1) ans) (BSB.byteString BS.empty)
   

-- Aut_Set({0,..,n-1})
-- To be used under the constraint (?n :: Int)
-- INVARIANT : VU.length x == ?n for x :: Perm
-- INVARIANT : VU.all (uncurry (==)) $ VU.indexed $ sort x for x :: Perm
type Perm = VU.Vector Int

idperm :: (?n :: Int) => Perm
{-# INLINE idperm #-}
idperm = VU.generate ?n id

inv :: (?n :: Int) => Perm -> Perm
{-# INLINE inv #-}
inv = g idperm

comp :: Perm -> Perm -> Perm
{-# INLINE comp #-}
comp = VU.map . (VU.!)

-- f p q = qp^{-1}
f :: (?n :: Int) => Perm -> Perm -> Perm
{-# INLINE f #-}
f = VU.update_ (VU.replicate ?n (-1))

-- g p q = pq^{-1}
g :: (?n :: Int) => Perm -> Perm -> Perm
{-# INLINE g #-}
g = flip f

-- conj p x = pxp^{-1}
conj :: (?n :: Int) => Perm -> Perm -> Perm
{-# INLINE conj #-}
conj p x = g (comp p x) p

-- conjinv p x = px^{-1}p^{-1}
conjinv :: (?n :: Int) => Perm -> Perm -> Perm
{-# INLINE conjinv #-}
conjinv p x = g p (comp p x)

sympow :: (?n :: Int) => Perm -> Int -> Perm
sympow p 0 = idperm
sympow p k = VU.create $ do
  vec <- VU.thaw idperm
  let loop !p !k = do
        when (testBit k 0) $ forM_ [0 .. ?n-1] $ VUM.modify vec (p VU.!)
        let k1 = shiftR k 1
        when (k1 > 0) $ loop (comp p p) k1
  if k >= 0 then loop p k else loop (inv p) (-k)
  return vec


rInt :: StateT BSL.ByteString Maybe Int
rInt = StateT $ BSL.readInt . BSL.dropWhile (<'!')
rIntS :: StateT BS.ByteString Maybe Int
rIntS = StateT $ BS.readInt . BS.dropWhile (<'!')

#define C(f,r,g,h,d) D(f,r,d);g,h::RealFrac a=>a->d;g=floor;h=ceiling

C(toInt,readInt,floorInt,ceilInt,Int)

C(toW32,readW32,floorW32,ceilW32,Word32)

{-# INLINE wrA #-}
wrA = A.writeArray
{-# INLINE rdA #-}
rdA = A.readArray
{-# INLINE mdA #-}
mdA arr f i = do
  ai <- rdA arr i
  let fai = f ai 
  wrA arr i fai
  return (ai,fai)
{-# INLINE mdA' #-}
mdA' arr f i = do
  !ai <- rdA arr i
  let !fai = f ai
  wrA arr i fai
  return (ai,fai)
{-# INLINE swapA #-}
swapA arr i j = do
  ai <- rdA arr i
  wrA arr i =<< rdA arr j
  wrA arr j ai

#define N(f,g,a,m)\
  f :: forall e i s. (C(a,m)A.Ix i) => (i,i) -> e -> m (a i e); f=A.newArray;\
  g :: forall e i s. (C(a,m)A.Ix i) => (i,i) -> m (a i e); g=A.newArray_
#define C(a,m)

#if !MIN_VERSION_base(4,11,0)
-- | 'iterate\'' is the strict version of 'iterate'.
--
-- It ensures that the result of each application of force to weak head normal
-- form before proceeding.
{-# NOINLINE [1] iterate' #-}
iterate' :: (a -> a) -> a -> [a]
iterate' f x =
    let x' = f x
    in x' `seq` (x : iterate' f x')

{-# INLINE [0] iterate'FB #-} -- See Note [Inline FB functions]
iterate'FB :: (a -> b -> b) -> (a -> a) -> a -> b
iterate'FB c f x0 = go x0
  where go x =
            let x' = f x
            in x' `seq` (x `c` go x')

{-# RULES
"iterate'"    [~1] forall f x.   iterate' f x = build (\c _n -> iterate'FB c f x)
"iterate'FB"  [1]                iterate'FB (:) = iterate'
 #-}
#endif

main :: IO ()
main = do
  [n,k] <- map readInt . words <$> getLine
  p <- VU.map (subtract 1) . VU.unfoldrN n (runStateT $ rIntS) <$> BS.getLine
  q <- VU.map (subtract 1) . VU.unfoldrN n (runStateT $ rIntS) <$> BS.getLine
  let ?n = n
  BSB.hPutBuilder stdout
    $ VU.foldr (\ !j r !sp -> sp <> BSB.intDec j <> r (BSB.char7 ' '))
       (\ !sp -> BSB.char7 '\n') (VU.map (+1) $ query p q k) mempty


query :: (?n :: Int) => Perm -> Perm -> Int -> Perm
query !p_immut !q_immut !k = VU.create $ do
  p <- VU.unsafeThaw p_immut
  q <- VU.unsafeThaw q_immut
  tmp_reg <- VUM.new (?n * 2)
  let (!tmp0,!tmp1) = VUM.splitAt ?n tmp_reg
      (!kd6, !km6) = (k-1) `divMod` 6
      loop !p !q !next 0  = return (p,q,next)
      loop !p !q !next !k = do
        forM_ [0 .. ?n-1] $ \ !i -> do
          pi <- VUM.unsafeRead p i
          VUM.write next pi =<< VUM.unsafeRead q i
        loop q next p (k-1)
  (!pp, !qq, !tmp2) <- loop p q tmp0 km6 -- (pp,qq) = F^km6(p,q)
      -- now tmp0,p,q are unusable
      -- Meaningful values are in pp and qq; tmp1 and tmp2 are free.
  forM_ [0 .. ?n-1] $ \ !i -> do -- tmp1 = qq*(qq*pp)^{-1}
    qpi <- VUM.unsafeRead qq =<< VUM.unsafeRead pp i
    VUM.unsafeWrite tmp1 qpi =<< VUM.unsafeRead qq i
  forM_ [0 .. ?n-1] $ \ !i -> do -- tmp2 = tmp1*pp
    VUM.unsafeWrite tmp2 i
      =<< VUM.unsafeRead tmp1 =<< VUM.unsafeRead pp i
      -- Values for later use are in tmp2 and pp
      -- tmp1 and qq have meaningful values, but will not be used later,
      -- and thus are free
  let pow !b !tmp !res !e = do
        forM_ [0 .. ?n-1] $ \ !i -> VUM.unsafeWrite res i i
        when (e > 0) $ powloop b tmp res e
      powloop !b !tmp !res !e = do
        when (odd e) $ forM_ [0 .. ?n-1] $ \ !i ->
          VUM.unsafeWrite res i
          =<< VUM.unsafeRead b =<< VUM.unsafeRead res i
        let !e1 = e `shiftR` 1
        when (e1 > 0) $ do
          forM_ [0 .. ?n-1] $ \ !i ->
            VUM.unsafeWrite tmp i
            =<< VUM.unsafeRead b =<< VUM.unsafeRead b i
          powloop tmp b res e1
  pow tmp2 qq tmp1 kd6 -- tmp1 = (tmp2)^kd6
    -- Now tmp2 and qq are freed and hold meaningless values
  forM_ [0 .. ?n - 1] $ \ !i -> do -- tmp2 = tmp1*pp*(tmp1)^{-1}
    tmp1i <- VUM.unsafeRead tmp1 i
    VUM.unsafeWrite tmp2 tmp1i
      =<< VUM.unsafeRead tmp1 =<< VUM.unsafeRead pp i
  return tmp2

main :: IO ()
main = do
  [n,k] <- map readInt . words <$> getLine
  [p,q] <- replicateM 2 $ VU.map (subtract 1)
    . VU.unfoldrN n (runStateT $ rIntS) <$> BS.getLine
  let ?n = n
  let (kd6, km6) = (k-1) `divMod` 6
      actor_main = sympow (conjinv q p `comp` p) kd6
      ans = (!! km6)
        [conj actor_main p,
         conj actor_main q,
         conj actor_main (f p q),
         conjinv (actor_main `comp` q) p,
         conjinv (comp actor_main q `g` p) q,
         conj (comp actor_main q `g` comp q p) (g p q)]
  BSB.hPutBuilder stdout
    $ F.fold
    $ V.imap (\i -> if i > 0 then (BSB.char7 ' ' <>) else id)
    $ V.map BSB.intDec $ V.convert ans

{-# LANGUAGE BangPatterns #-}
import Control.Monad
import Data.List
import Data.Int
import qualified Data.Vector.Unboxed as V
import qualified Data.Vector.Unboxed.Mutable as VM

infixl 7 <.>

newtype Perm = Perm (V.Vector Int16) deriving Eq

permFromIntList :: Int -> [Int] -> Perm
permFromIntList n xs = Perm $ V.fromListN n $ map (subtract 1 . fromIntegral) xs

identPerm :: Int -> Perm
identPerm n = Perm $ V.fromListN n [0..fromIntegral (n-1)]

compPerm :: Perm -> Perm -> Perm
compPerm (Perm f) (Perm g)
  = let n = V.length f -- = V.length g
    in Perm $ V.generate n $ \i -> f V.! (fromIntegral $ g V.! i)

(<.>) :: Perm -> Perm -> Perm
(<.>) = compPerm

invPerm :: Perm -> Perm
invPerm (Perm p) = Perm $ V.create $ do
  let n = V.length p
  q <- VM.new n
  forM_ [0..n-1] $ \i -> do
    VM.write q (fromIntegral $ p V.! i) (fromIntegral i)
  return q

powPerm :: Int -> Perm -> Int -> Perm
powPerm n _ 0 = identPerm n
powPerm _ p i = loop (i-1) p p
  where loop 0 !p !acc = acc
        loop 1 p acc = p `compPerm` acc
        loop i p acc = case quotRem i 2 of
                         (j,0) -> loop j (p `compPerm` p) acc
                         (j,_) -> loop j (p `compPerm` p) (acc `compPerm` p)

showPerm :: Perm -> String
showPerm (Perm p) = intercalate " " $ map (show . (+ 1)) $ V.toList p

parseInts :: String -> [Int]
parseInts s = case reads s of
                [(x,t)] -> x : parseInts t
                _ -> []

main = do
  [n,k] <- parseInts <$> getLine
  ps <- parseInts <$> getLine
  qs <- parseInts <$> getLine
  let p = permFromIntList n ps
      q = permFromIntList n qs
      f p q = q `compPerm` invPerm p

  {-
  let as = p : q : zipWith f as (tail as)
      a_k = as !! (k - 1)
  putStrLn $ showPerm a_k
  -}
  {-
  let loop i p q | i == 0 = p
                 | otherwise = loop (i - 1) q (f p q)
  putStrLn $ showPerm $ loop (k - 1) p q
  -}

  let m = (k + 1) `quot` 2
      r = (q <.> invPerm p) <.> (invPerm q <.> p)
      b = case m `quotRem` 3 of
            (l,0) -> powPerm n r (l-1) <.> q <.> invPerm p
            (l,1) -> powPerm n r l
            (l,_) -> powPerm n r l <.> q
      c = case k `rem` 6 of
            0 -> invPerm q <.> p
            1 -> p
            2 -> q
            3 -> invPerm p <.> q
            4 -> invPerm p
            _ -> invPerm q
      a_k' = b <.> c <.> invPerm b
  putStrLn $ showPerm a_k'

-- Aut_Set({0,..,n-1})
-- To be used under the constraint (?n :: Int)
-- INVARIANT : VU.length x == ?n for x :: Perm
-- INVARIANT : VU.all (uncurry (==)) $ VU.indexed $ sort x for x :: Perm
type Perm = VU.Vector Int

idperm :: (?n :: Int) => Perm
{-# INLINE idperm #-}
idperm = VU.generate ?n id

inv :: (?n :: Int) => Perm -> Perm
{-# INLINE inv #-}
inv = g idperm

comp :: Perm -> Perm -> Perm
{-# INLINE comp #-}
comp = VU.map . (VU.!)

-- f p q = qp^{-1}
f :: (?n :: Int) => Perm -> Perm -> Perm
{-# INLINE f #-}
f = VU.update_ (VU.replicate ?n (-1))

-- g p q = pq^{-1}
g :: (?n :: Int) => Perm -> Perm -> Perm
{-# INLINE g #-}
g = flip f

-- conj p x = pxp^{-1}
conj :: (?n :: Int) => Perm -> Perm -> Perm
{-# INLINE conj #-}
conj p x = g (comp p x) p

-- conjinv p x = px^{-1}p^{-1}
conjinv :: (?n :: Int) => Perm -> Perm -> Perm
{-# INLINE conjinv #-}
conjinv p x = g p (comp p x)

sympow :: (?n :: Int) => Perm -> Int -> Perm
{-# INLINE sympow #-}
sympow p 0 = idperm
sympow p k_ = VU.create $ do
  vec <- VU.thaw idperm
  pcopy <- if k_ > 0 then VU.thaw p else VU.thaw $ inv p
  let k = abs k_
  tmp <- VUM.replicate ?n 0
  let loop !p !tmp !k = do
        when (testBit k 0) $ forM_ [0 .. ?n-1] $ \i ->
          VUM.write vec i =<< VUM.read p =<< VUM.read vec i
        let k1 = shiftR k 1
        when (k1 > 0) $ do
          forM_ [0 .. ?n-1] $ \i ->
            VUM.write tmp i =<< VUM.read p =<< VUM.read p i
          loop tmp p k1
  loop pcopy tmp k
  return vec

-- | 'iterate\'' is the strict version of 'iterate'.
--
-- It ensures that the result of each application of force to weak head normal
-- form before proceeding.
{-# NOINLINE [1] iterate' #-}
iterate' :: (a -> a) -> a -> [a]
iterate' f x =
    let x' = f x
    in x' `seq` (x : iterate' f x')

{-# INLINE [0] iterate'FB #-} -- See Note [Inline FB functions]
iterate'FB :: (a -> b -> b) -> (a -> a) -> a -> b
iterate'FB c f x0 = go x0
  where go x =
            let x' = f x
            in x' `seq` (x `c` go x')

f :: [Int] -> [Int] -> [Int]

g k ps qs = if k == 1 then ps else g (k - 1) qs (f ps qs)

{-# INLINE [0] iterate'FB #-} -- See Note [Inline FB functions]
iterate'FB :: (a -> b -> b) -> (a -> a) -> a -> b
iterate'FB c f x0 = go x0
  where go x =
            let x' = f x
            in x' `seq` (x `c` go x')

{-# RULES
"iterate'"    [~1] forall f x.   iterate' f x = build (\c _n -> iterate'FB c f x)
"iterate'FB"  [1]                iterate'FB (:) = iterate'
 #-}

-- Aut_Set({0,..,n-1})
-- To be used under the constraint (?n :: Int)
-- INVARIANT : VU.length x == ?n for x :: Perm
-- INVARIANT : VU.all (uncurry (==)) $ VU.indexed $ sort x for x :: Perm
type Perm = VU.Vector Int

idperm :: (?n :: Int) => Perm
{-# INLINE idperm #-}
idperm = VU.generate ?n id

inv :: (?n :: Int) => Perm -> Perm
{-# INLINE inv #-}
inv = g idperm

comp :: Perm -> Perm -> Perm
{-# INLINE comp #-}
comp = VU.map . (VU.!)

-- f p q = qp^{-1}
f :: (?n :: Int) => Perm -> Perm -> Perm
{-# INLINE f #-}
f = VU.update_ (VU.replicate ?n (-1))

-- g p q = pq^{-1}
g :: (?n :: Int) => Perm -> Perm -> Perm
{-# INLINE g #-}
g = flip f

-- conj p x = pxp^{-1}
conj :: (?n :: Int) => Perm -> Perm -> Perm
{-# INLINE conj #-}
conj p x = g (comp p x) p

-- conjinv p x = px^{-1}p^{-1}
conjinv :: (?n :: Int) => Perm -> Perm -> Perm
{-# INLINE conjinv #-}
conjinv p x = g p (comp p x)

sympow :: (?n :: Int) => Perm -> Int -> Perm
sympow p 0 = idperm
sympow p k = VU.create $ do
  vec <- VU.thaw idperm
  let loop !p !k = do
        when (testBit k 0) $ forM_ [0 .. ?n-1] $ VUM.modify vec (p VU.!)
        let k1 = shiftR k 1
        when (k1 > 0) $ loop (comp p p) k1
  if k >= 0 then loop p k else loop (inv p) (-k)
  return vec

main :: IO ()

  ps <- map read . words <$> getLine

f :: [Int] -> [Int] -> [Int]
f ps qs = map snd . sort $ zip ps qs

g k ps qs = if k == 1 then ps else g (k - 1) qs (f ps qs)

{-# LANGUAGE BangPatterns #-}
import Control.Monad
import Data.List
import qualified Data.Vector.Unboxed as V
import qualified Data.Vector.Unboxed.Mutable as VM

infixl 7 <.>

newtype Perm = Perm (V.Vector Int) deriving Eq

permFromIntList :: Int -> [Int] -> Perm
permFromIntList n xs = Perm $ V.fromListN n $ map (subtract 1) xs

identPerm :: Int -> Perm
identPerm n = Perm $ V.fromListN n [0..n-1]

compPerm :: Perm -> Perm -> Perm
compPerm (Perm f) (Perm g)
  = let n = V.length f -- = V.length g
    in Perm $ V.generate n $ \i -> f V.! (g V.! i)

(<.>) :: Perm -> Perm -> Perm
(<.>) = compPerm

invPerm :: Perm -> Perm
invPerm (Perm p) = Perm $ V.create $ do
  let n = V.length p
  q <- VM.new n
  forM_ [0..n-1] $ \i -> do
    VM.write q (p V.! i) i
  return q

powPerm :: Int -> Perm -> Int -> Perm
powPerm n _ 0 = identPerm n
powPerm _ p i = loop (i-1) p p
  where loop 0 !p !acc = acc
        loop 1 p acc = p `compPerm` acc
        loop i p acc = case quotRem i 2 of
                         (j,0) -> loop j (p `compPerm` p) acc
                         (j,_) -> loop j (p `compPerm` p) (acc `compPerm` p)

showPerm :: Perm -> String
showPerm (Perm p) = intercalate " " $ map (show . (+ 1)) $ V.toList p

parseInts :: String -> [Int]
parseInts s = case reads s of
                [(x,t)] -> x : parseInts t
                _ -> []

main = do
  [n,k] <- parseInts <$> getLine
  ps <- parseInts <$> getLine
  qs <- parseInts <$> getLine
  let p = permFromIntList n ps
      q = permFromIntList n qs
      f p q = q `compPerm` invPerm p

  {-
  let as = p : q : zipWith f as (tail as)
      a_k = as !! (k - 1)
  putStrLn $ showPerm a_k
  -}
  {-
  let loop i p q | i == 0 = p
                 | otherwise = loop (i - 1) q (f p q)
  putStrLn $ showPerm $ loop (k - 1) p q
  -}

  let m = (k + 1) `quot` 2
      r = (q <.> invPerm p) <.> (invPerm q <.> p)
      b = case m `quotRem` 3 of
            (l,0) -> powPerm n r (l-1) <.> q <.> invPerm p
            (l,1) -> powPerm n r l
            (l,_) -> powPerm n r l <.> q
      c = case k `rem` 6 of
            0 -> invPerm q <.> p
            1 -> p
            2 -> q
            3 -> invPerm p <.> q
            4 -> invPerm p
            _ -> invPerm q
      a_k' = b <.> c <.> invPerm b
  putStrLn $ showPerm a_k'

-- To be used under the constraint (?n :: Int)
-- INVARIANT : VU.length x == ?n for x :: Perm
-- INVARIANT : VU.all (uncurry (==)) $ VU.indexed $ sort x for x :: Perm
type Perm = VU.Vector Int

idperm :: (?n :: Int) => Perm
{-# INLINE idperm #-}
idperm = VU.generate ?n id

inv :: (?n :: Int) => Perm -> Perm
{-# INLINE inv #-}
inv = g idperm

comp :: Perm -> Perm -> Perm
{-# INLINE comp #-}
comp = VU.map . (VU.!)

-- f p q = qp^{-1}
f :: (?n :: Int) => Perm -> Perm -> Perm
{-# INLINE f #-}
f = VU.update_ (VU.replicate ?n (-1))

-- g p q = pq^{-1}
g :: (?n :: Int) => Perm -> Perm -> Perm
{-# INLINE g #-}
g = flip f

-- conj p x = pxp^{-1}
conj :: (?n :: Int) => Perm -> Perm -> Perm
{-# INLINE conj #-}
conj p x = g (comp p x) p

-- conjinv p x = px^{-1}p^{-1}
conjinv :: (?n :: Int) => Perm -> Perm -> Perm
{-# INLINE conjinv #-}
conjinv p x = g p (comp p x)

sympow :: (?n :: Int) => Perm -> Int -> Perm
sympow p 0 = idperm
sympow p k = VU.create $ do
  vec <- VU.thaw idperm
  let loop !p !k = do
        when (testBit k 0) $ forM_ [0 .. ?n-1] $ VUM.modify vec (p VU.!)
        let k1 = shiftR k 1
        when (k1 > 0) $ loop (comp p p) k1
  if k >= 0 then loop p k else loop (inv p) (-k)
  return vec

main :: IO ()
main = do
  [n,k] <- map readInt . words <$> getLine
  p <- VU.map (subtract 1) . VU.unfoldrN n (runStateT $ rIntS) <$> BS.getLine
  q <- VU.map (subtract 1) . VU.unfoldrN n (runStateT $ rIntS) <$> BS.getLine
  let ?n = n
  BSB.hPutBuilder stdout
    $ VU.foldr (\ !j r !sp -> sp <> BSB.intDec j <> r (BSB.char7 ' '))
       (\ !sp -> BSB.char7 '\n') (VU.map (+1) $ query p q k) mempty


query :: (?n :: Int) => Perm -> Perm -> Int -> Perm
query !p_immut !q_immut !k = VU.create $ do
  p <- VU.unsafeThaw p_immut
  q <- VU.unsafeThaw q_immut
  tmp_reg <- VUM.new (?n * 2)
  let (!tmp0,!tmp1) = VUM.splitAt ?n tmp_reg
      (!kd6, !km6) = (k-1) `divMod` 6
      loop !p !q !next 0  = return (p,q,next)
      loop !p !q !next !k = do
        forM_ [0 .. ?n-1] $ \ !i -> do
          pi <- VUM.read p i
          VUM.write next pi =<< VUM.read q i
        loop q next p (k-1)
  (!pp, !qq, !tmp2) <- loop p q tmp0 km6 -- (pp,qq) = F^km6(p,q)
      -- now tmp0,p,q are unusable
      -- Meaningful values are in pp and qq; tmp1 and tmp2 are free.
  forM_ [0 .. ?n-1] $ \ !i -> do -- tmp1 = qq*(qq*pp)^{-1}
    qpi <- VUM.read qq =<< VUM.read pp i
    VUM.write tmp1 qpi =<< VUM.read qq i
  forM_ [0 .. ?n-1] $ \ !i -> do -- tmp2 = tmp1*pp
    VUM.write tmp2 i =<< VUM.read tmp1 =<< VUM.read pp i
      -- Values for later use are in tmp2 and pp
      -- tmp1 and qq have meaningful values, but will not be used later,
      -- and thus are free
  let pow !b !tmp !res !e = do
        forM_ [0 .. ?n-1] $ \ !i -> VUM.write res i i
        when (e > 0) $ powloop b tmp res e
      powloop !b !tmp !res !e = do
        when (odd e) $ forM_ [0 .. ?n-1] $ \ !i ->
          VUM.write res i =<< VUM.read b =<< VUM.read res i
        let !e1 = e `shiftR` 1
        when (e1 > 0) $ do
          forM_ [0 .. ?n-1] $ \ !i ->
            VUM.write tmp i =<< VUM.read b =<< VUM.read b i
          powloop tmp b res e1
  pow tmp2 qq tmp1 kd6 -- tmp1 = (tmp2)^kd6
    -- Now tmp2 and qq are freed and hold meaningless values
  forM_ [0 .. ?n - 1] $ \ !i -> do -- tmp2 = tmp1*pp*(tmp1)^{-1}
    tmp1i <- VUM.read tmp1 i
    VUM.write tmp2 tmp1i =<< VUM.read tmp1 =<< VUM.read pp i
  return tmp2

main :: IO ()
main = do
  [n,k] <- map readInt . words <$> getLine
  [p,q] <- replicateM 2 $ VU.map (subtract 1)
    . VU.unfoldrN n (runStateT $ rIntS) <$> BS.getLine
  let ?n = n
  let (kd6, km6) = (k-1) `divMod` 6
      actor = sympow (conjinv q p `comp` p) kd6
      p1 = conj actor p
      q1 = conj actor q
      ans = fst $ (!! km6) $ iterate' (\(!x,!y) -> y `seq` (y,f x y)) (p1,q1)
  BSB.hPutBuilder stdout
    $ VU.foldr (\ !j r !sp -> sp <> BSB.intDec j <> r (BSB.char7 ' '))
       (\ !sp -> BSB.char7 '\n') (VU.map (+1) ans) (BSB.byteString BS.empty)
   

-- Aut_Set({0,..,n-1})
-- To be used under the constraint (?n :: Int)
-- INVARIANT : VU.length x == ?n for x :: Perm
-- INVARIANT : VU.all (uncurry (==)) $ VU.indexed $ sort x for x :: Perm
type Perm = VU.Vector Int

idperm :: (?n :: Int) => Perm
{-# INLINE idperm #-}
idperm = VU.generate ?n id

inv :: (?n :: Int) => Perm -> Perm
{-# INLINE inv #-}
inv = g idperm

comp :: Perm -> Perm -> Perm
{-# INLINE comp #-}
comp = VU.map . (VU.!)

-- f p q = qp^{-1}
f :: (?n :: Int) => Perm -> Perm -> Perm
{-# INLINE f #-}
f = VU.update_ (VU.replicate ?n (-1))

-- g p q = pq^{-1}
g :: (?n :: Int) => Perm -> Perm -> Perm
{-# INLINE g #-}
g = flip f

-- conj p x = pxp^{-1}
conj :: (?n :: Int) => Perm -> Perm -> Perm
{-# INLINE conj #-}
conj p x = g (comp p x) p

-- conjinv p x = px^{-1}p^{-1}
conjinv :: (?n :: Int) => Perm -> Perm -> Perm
{-# INLINE conjinv #-}
conjinv p x = g p (comp p x)

-- PREREQUISTE : k >= 0
sympow :: (?n :: Int) => Perm -> Int -> Perm
{-# INLINE sympow #-}
sympow p 0 = idperm
sympow p k = VU.create $ do
  vec <- VU.thaw idperm
  pcopy <- VU.thaw p
  tmp <- VUM.replicate ?n 0
  let loop !p !tmp !k = do
        when (testBit k 0) $ forM_ [0 .. ?n-1] $ \i ->
          VUM.write vec i =<< VUM.read p =<< VUM.read vec i
        let k1 = shiftR k 1
        when (k1 > 0) $ do
          forM_ [0 .. ?n-1] $ \i ->
            VUM.write tmp i =<< VUM.read p =<< VUM.read p i
          loop tmp p k1
  loop pcopy tmp k
  return vec


rInt :: StateT BSL.ByteString Maybe Int
rInt = StateT $ BSL.readInt . BSL.dropWhile (<'!')
rIntS :: StateT BS.ByteString Maybe Int
rIntS = StateT $ BS.readInt . BS.dropWhile (<'!')

#define C(f,r,g,h,d) D(f,r,d);g,h::RealFrac a=>a->d;g=floor;h=ceiling

{-# INLINE wrA #-}
wrA = A.writeArray
{-# INLINE rdA #-}
rdA = A.readArray
{-# INLINE mdA #-}
mdA arr f i = do
  ai <- rdA arr i
  let fai = f ai 
  wrA arr i fai
  return (ai,fai)
{-# INLINE mdA' #-}
mdA' arr f i = do
  !ai <- rdA arr i
  let !fai = f ai
  wrA arr i fai
  return (ai,fai)
{-# INLINE swapA #-}
swapA arr i j = do
  ai <- rdA arr i
  wrA arr i =<< rdA arr j
  wrA arr j ai

-- | 'iterate\'' is the strict version of 'iterate'.
--
-- It ensures that the result of each application of force to weak head normal
-- form before proceeding.
{-# NOINLINE [1] iterate' #-}
iterate' :: (a -> a) -> a -> [a]
iterate' f x =
    let x' = f x
    in x' `seq` (x : iterate' f x')

{-# INLINE [0] iterate'FB #-} -- See Note [Inline FB functions]
iterate'FB :: (a -> b -> b) -> (a -> a) -> a -> b
iterate'FB c f x0 = go x0
  where go x =
            let x' = f x
            in x' `seq` (x `c` go x')

{-# RULES
"iterate'"    [~1] forall f x.   iterate' f x = build (\c _n -> iterate'FB c f x)
"iterate'FB"  [1]                iterate'FB (:) = iterate'
 #-}

-- | 'iterate\'' is the strict version of 'iterate'.
--
-- It ensures that the result of each application of force to weak head normal
-- form before proceeding.
{-# NOINLINE [1] iterate' #-}
iterate' :: (a -> a) -> a -> [a]
iterate' f x =
    let x' = f x
    in x' `seq` (x : iterate' f x')

{-# INLINE [0] iterate'FB #-} -- See Note [Inline FB functions]
iterate'FB :: (a -> b -> b) -> (a -> a) -> a -> b
iterate'FB c f x0 = go x0
  where go x =
            let x' = f x
            in x' `seq` (x `c` go x')

from operator import itemgetter


def get_identity():
    return list(range(1, n + 1))


def composition(ppp, qqq):
    return [ppp[q - 1] for q in qqq]


def reverse_composition(ppp, qqq):
    return [ppp[i] for i, q in sorted(enumerate(qqq), key=itemgetter(1))]


def solve(k, ppp, qqq):
    qp = reverse_composition(qqq, ppp)
    qpq = reverse_composition(qp, qqq)
    qpqp = composition(qpq, ppp)
   
    l, m = divmod(k - 1, 6)
    res = get_identity()
    tmp = qpqp
    while l:
        if l % 2 == 1:
            res = composition(res, tmp)
        tmp = composition(tmp, tmp)
        l >>= 1

    m = (k - 1) % 6
    if m == 0:
        base = ppp
    elif m == 1:
        base = qqq
    elif m == 2:
        base = reverse_composition(qqq, ppp)
    elif m == 3:
        res = composition(res, qqq)
        base = reverse_composition(get_identity(), ppp)
    elif m == 4:
        res = composition(res, qqq)
        res = reverse_composition(res, ppp)
        base = reverse_composition(get_identity(), qqq)
    elif m == 5:
        res = composition(res, qqq)
        res = reverse_composition(res, ppp)
        base = reverse_composition(get_identity(), qqq)
        base = composition(base, ppp)
    else:
        raise NotImplementedError

    ans = composition(res, base)
    ans = reverse_composition(ans, res)
    return ans

    if n == 0:
        return np.arange(len(a))
    x = power(a,n//2)
    x = mult(x,x)

def permutate(seq, perm):
    perm_dic = {k:v for k, v in zip(perm, seq)}
    perm_items = sorted(perm_dic.items())
    return [v[1] for v in perm_items]

def fibonacci(k):
    # k >= 3
    if k == 1:
        return 1
    if k == 2:
        return 1
    a = 1
    b = 1
    for x in range(k-2):
        c = a + b
        a = b
        b = c
    return c

    q_count = fibonacci(k-1)
    p_count = p_count % n
    q_count = q_count % n
    temp = q
    for x in range (p_count):
        temp = permutate(temp, p)
    for x in range(q_count):
        temp = permutate(temp, q)
    result = temp
        

print(' '.join(result))

qqq = list(map(int, input().split()))
ini_p = ppp[:]
ini_q = qqq[:]
i = 0
for i in range(k - 2):
    rrr = [q for p, q in sorted(zip(ppp, qqq))]
    if rrr == ini_p:
        break
    ppp = qqq
    qqq = rrr
else:
    print(*qqq)
    exit()

k = k % (i + 2)
ppp = ini_p
qqq = ini_q
for i in range(k - 2):
    rrr = [q for p, q in sorted(zip(ppp, qqq))]
    ppp = qqq
    qqq = rrr
print(*qqq)

from operator import itemgetter


def get_identity():
    return list(range(1, n + 1))


def composition(ppp, qqq):
    return [ppp[q - 1] for q in qqq]


def reverse_composition(ppp, qqq):
    return [ppp[i] for i, q in sorted(enumerate(qqq), key=itemgetter(1))]


def solve(k, ppp, qqq):
    qp = reverse_composition(qqq, ppp)
    qpq = reverse_composition(qp, qqq)
    qpqp = composition(qpq, ppp)

    l, m = divmod(k - 1, 6)
    res = get_identity()
    tmp = qpqp
    while l:
        if l % 2 == 1:
            res = composition(res, tmp)
        tmp = composition(tmp, tmp)
        l >>= 1

    m = (k - 1) % 6
    if m == 0:
        base = ppp
    elif m == 1:
        base = qqq
    elif m == 2:
        base = reverse_composition(qqq, ppp)
    elif m == 3:
        res = composition(res, qqq)
        base = reverse_composition(get_identity(), ppp)
    elif m == 4:
        res = composition(res, qqq)
        res = reverse_composition(res, ppp)
        base = reverse_composition(get_identity(), qqq)
    elif m == 5:
        res = composition(res, qqq)
        res = reverse_composition(res, ppp)
        base = reverse_composition(get_identity(), qqq)
        base = composition(base, ppp)
    else:
        raise NotImplementedError

    ans = composition(res, base)
    ans = reverse_composition(ans, res)
    return ans


n, k = map(int, input().split())
ppp = list(map(int, input().split()))
qqq = list(map(int, input().split()))
print(*solve(k, ppp, qqq))

from sys import stdin, stdout
from itertools import repeat
def pr(a):
    a = [x + 1 for x in a]
    stdout.write(' '.join(map(str, a)))
def main():
    n, k = map(int, stdin.readline().split())
    p = map(int, stdin.readline().split(), repeat(10, n))
    q = map(int, stdin.readline().split(), repeat(10, n))
    p = [x - 1 for x in p]
    q = [x - 1 for x in q]
    if k == 1:
        pr(p)
        return
    if k == 2:
        pr(q)
        return
    def inv(a):
        r = a[:]
        for i, x in enumerate(a):
            r[x] = i
        return r
    def comp(a, b):
        return [a[x] for x in b]
    pinv = inv(p)
    qinv = inv(q)
    b = q
    a = comp(q, pinv)
    if k == 3:
        pr(a)
        return
    w = [b, a]
    for i in xrange(4, 8):
        a, b = comp(a, inv(b)), a
        if k == i:
            pr(a)
            return
        w.append(a)
    y = range(n)
    x = comp(q, comp(pinv, comp(qinv, p)))
    r = (k - 8) / 6 + 1
    while r:
        if r & 1:
            y = comp(x, y)
        x = comp(x, x)
        r >>= 1
    t = comp(y, comp(w[(k - 8) % 6], inv(y)))
    pr(t)
main()
